short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the playback rate of HTML5 <video> and <audio> elements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a "Playback Rate" context menu to <video> and <audio> elements, allowing the speed at which it is played back to be controlled.

Note that Chrome's audio implementation currently has bugs (e.g. http://crbug.com/108239) which may result in the 1.25 and 1.5 rates not working.
